result.execSummary:
The defendant Lisa M Owens was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Lisa M Owens is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Lisa M Owens was found guilty of OWI (1st w/ Passenger < 16 Yrs Old), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).
  • Lisa M Owens was found guilty of Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: from Clerk to Defendant re: Court-ordered Payment Arrangements
No Appearance by Defendant.  Defendant has made payment arrangements.  Court orders Warrant - stayed pending compliance with Payment Plan Agreement.
Payment Plan Agreement/Letter of Understanding
FTP Hearing September 26, 2016, for $2,050.50
Payment Plan Agreement/Letter of Understanding

2:49 p.m.  Defendant present in court with Atty Barb Privat.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Court recites agreement - defendant will plea to count 1 & count 4.  State concurs.  Atty privat concurs.  Defendant concurs.

Court goes over plea questionnaire with the defendant.  Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.

Defendant enters a plea of GUILTY.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty on counts 1 & 4.  Court orders count 2 be dismissed outright & 3 be dismissed and read-in.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  Sentencing statement by DA.  Sentencing statement by Atty Privat.  Statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:

COUNT 1

-5 days county jail - huber.  Sentence is to commence within 60 days.  Court grants out-of-county service and out-of-county travel.
-$350 fine plus court costs.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
-Blood Draw Fee - $42.50
-DL revocation - 12 months
-IID - 12 months
-AODA (FDL)
-DNA sample.

COUNT 4

-$100 fine plus court costs.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
-DNA Sample.

Court adjourned at 2:58 p.m.

records.addlTxt: Status hearing on May 3, 2016 at 02:00 pm.

11:18 a.m.  Defendant present in court with Atty Barb Privat.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Court denies the request for court appointed counsel as Atty Privat has been appointed.  Statement by Atty privat - has an offer and needs another court date.  Court sets for Status Hearing on May 3, 2016 at 2:00 p.m.

Court adjourned at 11:20 a.m.
State's
Defendant's
Defendant's
By Atty Barb Privat
Status hearing at 03-15-2016 10:30 am

Per Deb at the PD's office, the defendant qualifies for PD representation and will be appointing counsel.  Status Hearing for 02/08 removed from the court calendar.
43
Status hearing at 02-08-2016 08:30 am

10:03 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by defendant - requests an attorney.  Court instructs the defendant regarding contacting the PD's office first and then attempt to contact two attorneys on her own.  Court sets for Status Hearing on February 8, 2016 at 8:30 a.m.

Court adjourned at 10:04 a.m.
Status hearing at 01-11-2016 09:30 am

8:59 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court instructs the defendant of his right to an attorney.  Defendant stands mute.  Court enters a plea of NOT GUILTY on behalf of the defendant.  DA makes bond recommendation.  Court sets bond at $500.00 signature bond.  Court will set for Status Hearing on January 11, 2016 at 9:30 a.m.

Court adjourned at 9:02 a.m.
**PROCESSING COMPLETE**
